definitions.definition: ( general ) A rapid transit rail transport system, or a train in such systems, generally underground and serving a metropolitan area.
examples: He is going to the stadium by metro .

definitions.definition: ( less common ) An urban rapid transit rail transport system, normally with lighter track and light trains (i.e. an S-Bahn or similar), or a train in such systems.

main_definition: ( general ) A rapid transit rail transport system, or a train in such systems, generally underground and serving a metropolitan area.
secondary_definitions: ( less common ) An urban rapid transit rail transport system, normally with lighter track and light trains (i.e. an S-Bahn or similar), or a train in such systems.
